document_data.name: Thoalur Harbright
document_data.familyrefs: {{Cite dragon/320/Elminster's Guide to the Realms: The Roaring Dragon House|72}}
document_data.mainbody: '''Thoalur Harbright''' was one of the proprietors of the [[Roaring Dragon House]], a newly opened gambling hall and tavern just outside [[Waterdeep]], ''circa'' the [[1372 DR|Year of Wild Magic, 1372 DR]].
document_data.Abilities: Thoalur learned the basics of being a warrior, but most of his time was spent managing the Roaring Dragon House, taking turns as shift supervisor with this sister [[Brarindra Harbright|Brarindra]]. They were occasionally given a reprieve by other members of the Harbrights. On his shifts, he was in charge of a company of over forty mercenary guards plus dozens of servers, escorts, coin keepers (folks who ran the games), tellers, and stablehands.
document_data.Relationships: Thoalur was the nephew of [[Drengar Harbright]], proprietor of the [[High Flagon]] inn and gambling hall for the [[Harbright]] family that was located just up the road. Drengar and the family commissioned the Roaring Dragon to be built and he put Thoalur and Brarindra in charge of day-to-day operations.
